Warta Bolesławiecka () is a village in Bolesławiec County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It is the seat of the administrative district (gmina) called Gmina Warta Bolesławiecka.
From 1975 to 1998 the village was in Legnica Voivodeship.
